cards.title: Nexus
powers: Select a damage type. {Nexus} deals 1 target 1 damage of that type.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may Play a card now.
Select a damage type. one hero deals 1 target 1 damage of that type.
Select a damage type. until the start of your turn, increase all damage of that type by 1.

openingLines.default: from here out, you'll weather every manner of disaster. Is it worth it?
openingLines.ChokepointCharacter: don't I know it! my real power should terrify you.
openingLines.DeadlineCharacter: well. yeah. it's my planet. now vamos.
openingLines.Cauldron.GrayCharacter: rude. this tech is only secondary, but you can forget it anyway!
openingLines.Cauldron.VectorCharacter: blood is mostly water. let's see what I can do with that, hm?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: ash I can work with. but until then I've got everything else to throw at you.

cards.title: Action Environmental Scientist
body: whenever you destroy an environment target, you may draw a card.
the first time each turn you destroy a villain target, you may play a card.

cards.title: Aerokinesis
body: increase projectile and lightning damage by 1.
whenever {Nexus} deals projectile damage to a target, 1 player may draw a card.

cards.title: Atmospheric Disturbance
body: {Nexus} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage and 1 different target 2 fire damage, in either order.
reveal the top card of your deck. if it is a one-shot, put it into play. otherwise, move it to your hand.

cards.title: Hydrokinesis
body: increase cold and toxic damage by 1.
whenever {Nexus} deals cold damage to a target, 1 target regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Instant Storm
body: {Nexus} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage and 1 different target 2 cold damage, in either order.
Up to 5 targets regain 1 HP each.

cards.title: Lithokinesis
body: increase melee and infernal damage by 1.
whenever {Nexus} deals melee damage to a target, discard the top card of that target's deck.

cards.title: Mudslide Warning
body: {Nexus} deals 1 target 2 melee damage and 1 different target 2 cold damage, in either order.
Destroy 1 ongoing card.

cards.title: Old Faithful
body: {Nexus} deals 1 target 2 cold damage and 1 different target 2 fire damage, in either order.
You may discard a card. if you do, another player may play a card.

cards.title: Plasma Condenser
body: the first time each turn {Nexus} deals fire damage to a target, she also deals that target 1 radiant damage.
powers: destroy a hero ongoing or equipment card. if a card is destroyed this way, {Nexus} deals each non-hero target 1 fire damage. if [i]Hydrokinesis[/i] is in play, move the destroyed card to its player's hand.

cards.title: Pyrokinesis
body: increase fire and radiant damage by 1.
whenever {Nexus} deals fire damage to a target, that target deals itself 1 fire damage.

cards.title: Sandblast
body: {Nexus} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage and 1 different target 2 melee damage, in either order.
{Nexus} may deal herself 2 irreducible psychic damage. if she takes damage this way, another player may use a power.

cards.title: Seismic Inducer
body: the first time each turn {Nexus} deals melee damage to a target, she also deals that target 1 infernal damage.
powers: Discard the top card of each deck. if [i]Aerokinesis[/i] is in play, put the top card of 1 trash into play.

cards.title: Static Terminal
body: the first time each turn {Nexus} deals projectile damage to a target, she also deals that target 1 lightning damage.
powers: {Nexus} deals each target 2 lightning damage. if [i]Lithokinesis[/i] is in play, reduce damage dealt to hero targets this way to 0.

cards.title: Toxin Distiller
body: the first time each turn {Nexus} deals cold damage to a target, she also deals that target 1 toxic damage.
powers: until the end of your next turn, each time {Nexus} deals toxic damage to a target, reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 1. while [i]Pyrokinesis[/i] is in play, this applies to cold and fire damage as well.

cards.title: Training Break
body: you may shuffle your trash into your deck.
reveal cards from the top of your deck until a non-limited ongoing card is revealed. put it into play. discard the other revealed cards.
you may move an equipment card from your trash to your hand.

cards.title: Unlocked Palmtop
body: whenever one of your non-limited cards is destroyed, you may discard a card. if you do, move the destroyed card into your hand.
powers: reveal the top card of each deck, then replace it. select a deck and either discard or put into play its top card. if a card was put into play this way, {Nexus} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage.

cards.title: Visit to the Lab
body: you may shuffle your trash into your deck.
reveal cards from the top of your deck until a non-limited equipment card is revealed. put it into play. discard the other revealed cards.
you may move an ongoing card from your trash to your hand.

cards.title: Volcanic Activity
body: {Nexus} deals 1 target 2 melee damage and 1 different target 2 fire damage, in either order.
Destroy 1 environment card.
